elements.name: lvngRootText
elements.html: We believe you're more likely to help us if you know your data can't be used anywhere else. We're not asking for your last name, so we have no way to connect you with any of your private data. Click the links below to learn about how your privacy is protected and what we'll be doing with this survey information.

elements.html: About your privacy

elements.name: lvngRootInfoYourData
elements.html: How will we be using your information?

elements.name: lvngRootUserText
elements.html:
For verification purposes, we'll contact a random sample of survey particpants, so you may or may not get a message from us. If you're concerned about providing your email address, please use your Facebook account name and Facebook Messenger for verification.

With your consent, we may also contact you to talk in more detail about your experience with LP.

If more than one of your beloved animals have LP, you can take the survey for each of them. You can also update the survey responses for each animal, but only one set of results are saved for each Facebook account or email and each animal. Each time you take, it, existing results will be updated with the most recent ones.
You can find your Facebook user name at the end of the Facebook URL after the slash. Example: https://facebook.com/my.user.name.
